sentences.en: A new multi - plane ATM switching fabric architecture is proposed in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文提出一种新的多平面ATM交换网络结构.

sentences.en: An ATM term. A collection of managed entities grouped for administrative reasons.
sentences.cn: 一种ATM术语. 因管理而组合在一起的管理实体的集合.

sentences.en: ATM adaptor is the key of user and network interface.
sentences.cn: ATM适配器是用户网络接口的关键.

sentences.en: ATM is a connection - oriented, packet switching, and statistically multiplexing technology.
sentences.cn: ATM是一种面向连接的 、 分组交换和统计复用技术.

sentences.en: Available Bit Rate ( ABR ) Flow Control in Asynchronous Transfer Mode ( ATM ) Networks.
sentences.cn: ATM网络中ABR流量控制的研究.

sentences.en: Fibre Channel and ATM allow for these different classes of service.
sentences.cn: FibreChannel和ATM允许有这些不同的服务种类.

sentences.en: Keep your ATM card in a safe place.
sentences.cn: 把你的自动取款卡放在一个安全的地方。

sentences.en: Ken: And what if I take out cash from another bank's ATM?
sentences.cn: 那么如果我要从另一家银行的ATM取款 机中取款怎么办 呢 ?

sentences.en: Losing cells is the main defect of image communication under ATM.
sentences.cn: 信元丢失是异步转移模式(ATM)环境下图像通信的主要缺点.

sentences.en: Not charge a handling fee ATM withdrawals interbank city.
sentences.cn: 不收取ATM同城跨行取款手续费.

sentences.en: Now, the software development platform apply to ATM, POS and so on.
sentences.cn: 目前, 此开发平台已成功地应用于ATM自动 柜员机 、 嵌入式税控收款机等银税类终端产品的开发.

sentences.en: On Key Technologies of the On - Board ATM Switching Satellite Communications System.
sentences.cn: 星上ATM交换卫星通信系统的关键技术研究.

sentences.en: The bank was criticized when It'surcharges for ATM withdrawals.
sentences.cn: 该银行因为使用ATM提款要加收费用而被批评.

sentences.en: The guards were servicing an ATM when the shooting started.
sentences.cn: 案发当时,保安正在维护ATM( 自动存取款)机.

sentences.en: This paper proposes a self - routing fault - tolerant switching network for ATM switching systems.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了一种自寻径、容错的ATM交换结构.

sentences.en: This recommendation defines the functions of the Asynchronous Transfer Mode ( ATM ) layer.
sentences.cn: 本建议规定了异步转移模式 ( ATM ) 层的功能.

trans.tran_cn: Automatic Teller Machine 自动取款（出纳）机，Asynchronous Transfer Mode 异步传输模式
自动取款机，自动柜员机
trans.tran_en: a machine outside a bank that you use to get money from your account
